test_code:
knapsack.test.ex2 = let
	Test.label "One item - too heavy" <| Test.expect (maximum_value 10 [(100, 1)] === 0)
name: knapsack.test.ex2

test_code:
knapsack.test.ex3 = let
	Test.label "Five items - cannot be greedy by weight" <| Test.expect (maximum_value 10 [(2, 5), (2, 5), (2, 5), (2, 5), (10, 21)] === 21)
name: knapsack.test.ex3

test_code:
knapsack.test.ex4 = let
	Test.label "Five items - cannot be greedy by value" <| Test.expect (maximum_value 10 [(2, 20), (2, 20), (2, 20), (2, 20), (10, 50)] === 80)
name: knapsack.test.ex4
